csdl.jupiter.ui.view.table
Class ReviewFilterManager

java.lang.Object
  csdl.jupiter.ui.view.table.ReviewFilterManager

public class ReviewFilterManager
extends java.lang.Object

Provides the manager for the ReviewFilter instance. Clients can check the filter status (if the filter instance is created and added to the view or not), and/or add/remove the filter instance to/from the ReviewTableView view.

Version:
$Id: ReviewFilterManager.java,v 1.15 2005/03/28 14:39:30 takuyay Exp $
Author:
Takuya Yamashita
